scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules chatbot/node_modules package-lock.json chatbot/package-lock.json server/node_modules server/package-lock.json chatbot/.expo && cd server && npm cache clean --force && cd .. && cd chatbot && npm cache clean --force
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean & npm run install-all
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-chatbot && npm run install-server
scripts.start: npm run getLocalIP & npm run install-all & npm run project
